name: Zelva Latest
description:
The story of the last turtle, which must overcome a long and dangerous path to the ocean, where her brothers and sisters are now.

Gameplay

- Try to no overheated and starve

- Beware crabs and flying fish (it food too)

- Hide in sand to survive

Control

  • WASD (or arrows) - walking
  • SPACE - action

Write in the comments if you found a duck :D
